books.author: by Patricia Briggs
books.description: The fifth book in the Alpha and Omega series. Mated werewolves Charles Cornick and Anna Latham answer a call of distress.
books.name: BURN BRIGHT

books.author: by Brad Meltzer
books.description: Nola Brown, a painter and trained soldier, discovers a military secret that traces back to Harry Houdini.
books.name: THE ESCAPE ARTIST

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A former prisoner of war returns from Vietnam and moves his family to Alaska, where they face tough conditions.
books.name: THE GREAT ALONE

books.author: by Jason Matthews
books.description: A Russian intelligence officer trained in the art of seduction becomes entangled with a young C.I.A. officer.
books.name: RED SPARROW

books.author: by Jason Fry
books.description: An adaptation of the film, written with input from its director, Rian Johnson, which includes scenes from alternate versions of the script.
books.name: STAR WARS: THE LAST JEDI

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: It’s 2044, life on a resource-depleted Earth has grown increasingly grim, and the key to a vast fortune is hidden in a virtual-reality world.
books.name: READY PLAYER ONE

books.author: by Linda Howard
books.description: An on-site drone operator for a paramilitary organization is tested when a congresswoman works to destroy the unit.
books.name: THE WOMAN LEFT BEHIND

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Karen Marie Moning
books.description: The 10th book of the Fever series.
books.name: HIGH VOLTAGE

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Tayari Jones
books.description: A newlywed couple's relationship is tested when the husband is sentenced to 12 years in prison.
books.name: AN AMERICAN MARRIAGE

books.author: by James Patterson and Candice Fox
books.description: Detective Harriet Blue tries to clear her brother's name and save a small Australian town from being massacred.
books.name: FIFTY FIFTY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The detective Amos Decker (“Memory Man”) witnesses a murder-suicide that turns out to be a matter of national security.
books.name: THE FIX

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS
